bill_title: provide for the transfer of certain moneys from the Department of Game, Fish and Parks to the county road and bridge funds.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for the transfer of certain moneys from the Department of Game, Fish and Parks to the county road and bridge funds. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby created in the state treasury the Game, Fish and Parks county road fund. At the end of each calendar year, the Department of Game, Fish and Parks shall deposit in the fund the amount of one dollar for every license sold by the department during the previous calendar year under its statutory authority. Section 2. The moneys deposited in the Game, Fish and Parks county road fund need not be collected as license fees or surcharges. The Game, Fish and Parks Commission may allocate or transfer any moneys under its authority to this purpose or may institute fee increases or surcharges at its discretion. Section 3. On or about February first of each year, the state treasurer shall distribute the moneys in the Game, Fish and Parks county road fund as follows: (1) For each license sold that is restricted to use in a specific geographic unit, one dollar shall be distributed to the county road and bridge fund of the county in which the unit is located. If two or more counties are within the unit, the dollar shall be divided evenly among the counties; (2) For each license sold, that is not restricted to use in a specific geographic unit, one dollar shall be distributed equally to the county road and bridge funds of each of the sixty-six counties. Section 4. The Department of Game, Fish and Parks shall collect, tabulate, and furnish the state treasurer with the information necessary to distribute the proceeds of the Game, Fish and Parks county road fund pursuant to section 3 of this Act.
